statements: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, status FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1002 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_orders FROM orders WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'shipped' AND customer_id = 456 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM orders WHERE status IN ('pending', 'processing') ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(order_date) AS latest_order_date FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE delivery_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name ILIKE 'J%' ORDER BY email
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, item_name FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, item_name, quantity, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT order_id, status, last_updated FROM order_status ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE orders.quantity > 10 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE item_name LIKE '%Shirt%' AND delivery_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, order_status.status FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN order_status ON orders.order_id = order_status.order_id WHERE orders.order_date > '2022-01-01' AND order_status.status = 'Shipped'
SELECT orders.order_id, COUNT(*) AS num_items FROM orders GROUP BY orders.order_id HAVING num_items > 1 ORDER BY num_items DESC
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, status FROM order_status WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT order_id, status FROM order_status WHERE status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.first_name, customers.last_name, orders.status FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, order_details.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN order_details ON products.product_id = order_details.product_id;
SELECT orders.order_id, order_status.status, order_status.update_date FROM orders LEFT JOIN order_status ON orders.order_id = order_status.order_id WHERE orders.status = 'Shipped';
